name: grpc-dotnet
description: Guidance for gRPC in .NET using Grpc.AspNetCore and Grpc.Net.Client. USE FOR: gRPC service definitions, proto file compilation, unary and streaming RPCs, gRPC client factory, deadline/cancellation, interceptors, gRPC-Web for browser clients. DO NOT USE FOR: REST/HTTP APIs (use ASP.NET Core), real-time browser push (use SignalR), custom TCP protocols (use dotnetty), email protocols (use mimekit).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
